info.+content: Asta is a young boy who dreams of becoming the greatest mage in the kingdom. He only has one problem, he can't use magic. Luckily for Asta, he receives the incredibly rare five-leaf clover grimoire that gives him the power of anti-magic. Even though he can't use magic, he plans to become the Wizard King. (from manga)
#4: "Guess Who Is Back" by Kumi Koda (eps 40-51)
#12: "Eien ni Hikare" by TOMORROW X TOGETHER (eps 141-157)

"Haruka Mirai last page ver." by Kankakupiero (ep 170)
"Haruka Mirai" (Distant Future) by Kankakupiero (ep 49, ep 100, ep 119)
